Hey Nick,
Hope you had a nice weekend! A for logins, yes we would like to test out grabbing successful ones if possible. If it creates too much noise and data, we'll look to pull it back on some servers or all. So just let us know what sort of script modifications are needed for this and we can go from there.

Thanks !

Doug
